original_title: Lost in Religion: Welcher Glaube für mein Kind
overview: Marc Burth wants to find the best religion to raise his children in, but living in a family that boasts a Muslim, a Catholic, a Jew, a Shaman and several Atheists that's not going to be easy. This highly amusing and revelatory HD documentary playfully addresses the questions so many of us struggle with.
title: Lost in Religion: Welcher Glaube für mein Kind
